summary: São Paulo is Brazil's biggest city and an important place in the world for business, art, and fun. It's named after Paul the Apostle and has people from many countries living there. The city started with Jesuit priests in 1554 and grew strong during the coffee trade. Now, it's a huge economic center with lots of big companies and a cool cultural scene. São Paulo hosts big events like the World Cup and has awesome museums, parks, and festivals. It's also home to super tall buildings!
title: São Paulo
